episode: I recently bought a new car.  I have been holding onto my old one for years, but it started having issues.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I recently got a new car.  I had been driving my old car for about 13 years.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's a big change! Exciting but also a little sad to say goodbye to the old one, right?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I'm not sad at all.  It was time for it to go.  I'm excited to get the new technology that is in my new car.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's great! New tech can be a lot of fun. What's your favorite feature so far?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I really like that my car has technology that will help to prevent me from rear ending someone.  I'm a very safe driver, but I just like to be extra safe.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Being extra safe is always a good thing! That feature must give you some extra peace of mind on the road.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yep.  I also like the rear view camera.  I hate driving blind.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Rear view cameras are a game changer. So much easier to back up now!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes!  The camera also has a system that helps you to park.  It will alert you if you aren't parking in a space properly.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's awesome! Parallel parking just got a whole lot easier, huh?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It has!  I don't do much parallel parking, but I am itching to try out the parking system when I do.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Ha ha, sounds like you're looking forward to putting it to the test!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I am.  I'm happy that I was able to get a good price for this car.  I expect for the prices to shoot up in the future thanks to the tariff wars.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Smart thinking! You timed your purchase well, it sounds like.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I was very lucky.  If my old car failed a few more months down the road, I may have had to pay thousands of dollars more.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: What a relief! You dodged a potentially expensive bullet.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I believe so.  Hopefully, this car can last me for another 10 years or so like my old car.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Fingers crossed! A decade's a great run for a car.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It is.  It feels great to have a dependable car.  When your car is having issues, I feel anxious.  I depend on my car so much.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Having a reliable ride is a huge stress reducer.
